snippet: The police said the 9-year-old was sitting in the back seat when the car was struck by a minivan driven by a man fleeing an accident minutes earlier.
abstract: Rebecca Ramnarine, 9-year-old Brooklyn girl, dies after car she is riding in is struck by minivan fleeing another accident.
lead_paragraph: The police said the 9-year-old was sitting in the back seat when the car was struck by a minivan driven by a man fleeing an accident minutes earlier.

headline.main: Girl Is Killed in Brooklyn by Driver Fleeing Police
headline.print_headline: Girl Is Killed in Brooklyn by Driver Fleeing Police
